articles.title: National Meeting Commemorates Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Meeting Commemorates Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting commemorating the 99th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Thursday.
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service persons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Interior Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, labor innovators, working people in the city, delegations of overseas compatriots and Koreans from abroad and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of various countries, members of the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests were present on invitation.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, delivered a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter referred to the fact that Kim Il Sung was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family in Mangyongdae and embarked upon the road of struggle for the national liberation in his teens.
					
					 He led to victory the historic struggle of the Korean people for a long period from the national liberation revolution to socialist construction, performing great feats in the history of the Korean revolution and the struggle for human emancipation, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a brilliant thinker and theoretician who founded the Juche idea, indicating the most correct path of the revolutionary struggle of the popular masses for independence. 
					
					 He gave origin to the Songun revolution and led to victory two revolutionary wars, saving the destiny of the country and the nation and laying a solid military foundation for the building of a rich and powerful socialist country.
					
					 He successfully accomplished the cause of building the party and the nation in a short span of time after liberation and developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party guided by the Juche idea and having its roots struck deep among the broad masses and the government of the DPRK into a genuine power of the people with the popular masses becoming its masters and it serving them.
					
					 He freed the Korean people from exploitation and oppression once and for all and built in Korea a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He considered national reunification as the greatest task of the nation and worked heart and soul to carry it out all his life and performed undying exploits for the human emancipation and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					His revolutionary idea and cause have been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The reporter underlined the need for all the service persons and people to uphold the revolutionary idea and exploits of the President with pure conscience, carry out the revolution and construction as required by the Juche idea, the Songun idea and the way the President did and devotedly implement his behests in all fields and at all units.
					
					 We should wage a fierce all-out offensive and a drive to make a breakthrough to realize the desire of the President for a great prosperous and powerful nation and thus bring about great changes on all fronts and commemorate the centenary of birth of the President as the greatest holiday of Kim Il Sung's nation and a great auspicious holiday of mankind, the reporter urged, and went on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the reckless military provocations of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative authorities but mercilessly wipe out the aggressors and surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make positive endeavors to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with all countries friendly to it in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and achieve global independence. 
					
					 Similar meetings also took place in various provinces, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Arrested US Citizen Admits His Crime against DPRK
articles.content:
Arrested US Citizen Admits His Crime against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- U.S. citizen Jun Young Su was arrested in November 2010 and has since been investigated by a relevant organ for committing a crime against the DPRK after entering it. 
					He admitted his crime in the course of investigation.
					
					The U.S. side was informed of this through a relevant channel and necessary humanitarian conveniences including consular contact are being provided to him in touch with the Swedish embassy here which looks after U.S. interests.
					
					The relevant organ is making arrangements to indict him according to the confirmation of the charges brought against him.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Vietnamese Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Vietnamese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Vietnamese Ministry of Public Security led by Minister Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 The head of the delegation said that the Vietnamese party and government are attaching great importance to the friendly relations between Vietnam and the DPRK.
					
					 Hoping that the traditional bilateral relations of friendship would grow stronger, he expressed the will to contribute to strengthening the exchange and cooperation between public security organs of the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Foreign Party Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Foreign Party Leaders
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Thursday separately met and had talks with C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), and Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico.
					 C.P. Mainali said that the world progressive political parties have studied and disseminated the immortal Juche idea founded by the President and expressed support and solidarity with the just cause of the WPK and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez said that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the army and people of the DPRK are reliably defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 He expressed belief that the cooperation and solidarity between his Party and the WPK would grow stronger.

articles.title: Event Held at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Event Held at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on April 11 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice Foreign Minister Aleksei Borodavkin, deputies to the State Duma, members of the Federation Council, the former defense minister of the Soviet Union and personages of political parties, the government and organizations of Russia. 
					
					 Ambassador Kim Yong Jae and officials of the DPRK embassy in Moscow were on hand. 
					
					The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length picture of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. They looked round the photos on display under the theme of "Valuing National Cultural Heritages" and "All Life Dedicated to People".
					
					 Kim Yong Jae said at the reception that Kim Il Sung was the greatest man as he devoted all his life to the country and happiness of the people and the human cause of independence. 
					
					 He expressed the will to strive for development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries. 
					
					 Aleksei Borodavkin said that the Russia-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation provided by Kim Il Sung have long-standing tradition and solid foundation. 
					
					 He stressed the need to boost the bilateral cooperation on the basis of the agreement reached between the top leaders of the two countries and the treaty between the two countries. 
					
					 There was a performance by the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior.

articles.title: Event Held in China
articles.content:
Event Held in China
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held in China on Tuesday to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending the event were officials of the China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact, families of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and veterans of the Chinese People's Volunteers.
					
					 Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to China and a friendly delegation of the DPRK led by the vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles vice-chairman of the C.C., the DPRK-China Friendship Association.
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 Speeches were made by Li Xiaohua, vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, and Liu Xiaohua, a family member of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and others.
					
					 They recalled with deep emotion the glorious life of Kim Il Sung, praising him as the peerlessly great man recognized by the whole world.
					
					 He enjoys deep reverence of the Chinese people for the China-DPRK friendship provided by him with Mao Zedong, Zhou Enlai and other Chinese revolutionaries of elder generation and for his distinguished contribution to its development, they said.
					
					The revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered and led by him has been creditably carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, they said, expressing belief that the Korean people would achieve success in their drive to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living and building a thriving nation.
					
					  They voiced their determination to strive to boost the traditional China-DPRK friendly relations true to the intention of the top leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: 9th Meeting of International Kim Il Sung Prize Council Held
articles.content:
9th Meeting of International Kim Il Sung Prize Council Held
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The 9th meeting of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council was held in Pyongyang on Wednesday. 
					 Present at the meeting were Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Directors of the Council Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, and others.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the work done by the council and set forth the orientation to improve its activities.
					
					 It discussed a concrete plan to greet 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, as the greatest holiday of humankind.
					
					 New directors of the council were elected to fill up the vacancies.
					
					A letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Meeting of Korean Children's Union Organizations Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Korean Children's Union Organizations Held
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations was held in the plaza of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Thursday on the occasion of the 99th birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung. 
					 It was attended by delegates of the union from provinces, schoolchildren in Pyongyang and pupils joining the union. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Choe Ryong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, officials of the working people's organizations, officials of the youth league, war veterans, persons of merits, and parents of pupils. 
					
					 The participants in the meeting made a salute in profound reverence, looking up to the portrait of smiling Generalissimo. 
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said in his report: The undying exploits Kim Il Sung performed by training the younger generation as reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche with profound love and benevolence would shine forever. 
					
					The history of loving care shown by the Generalissimo is given steady continuity thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has led the members of the union with warm care on the basis of his immensely noble view on the rising generation.
					
					 There are no youngsters in the world who are as proud and happy as the members of the union, he noted, calling on everybody to be good at study and organizational life and thus prepare themselves as genuine successors to the cause of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 A ceremony of joining the KCU took place at the meeting.
					
					 Led by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, pupils joining the union took an oath.
					
					 Leading officials, war veterans, persons of merits and officials of the youth league put red ties around their necks and pinned badges on their chests.
					
					 Then followed congratulatory speeches.

articles.title: Pyongyang Seethed in Festive Mood
articles.content:
Pyongyang Seethed in Festive Mood
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang, the capital of the DPRK, is seethed in a festive mood to commemorate President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary, April 15.
					 Many people, including servicemen and schoolchildren, have visited Mangyongdae, his birthplace, with deep reverence for the President, who augmented the dignity of the nation.
					
					 An endless stream of people with floral baskets and bunches are climbing Mansu Hill where his statue is standing.
					
					 Streets are decked with posters, national flags, large electronic displays and pictures showing great feats performed by Kim Il Sung for the independence of humankind.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 13th Kimilsungia Festival was opened at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition and the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is going on at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, Moranbong Theatre and other theatres in Pyongyang.
					
					 Pleasure parks, fun fairs and public catering establishments are crowded with people.

articles.title: Joint Performances of April Art Festival
articles.content:
Joint Performances of April Art Festival
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Joint performances of the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival took place at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the Central Youth Hall on Thursday.
					 The performance was given by artistes of China, Finland, Cuba, Romania, Ukraine and Mongolia and overseas Korean artistes.
					
					The performances showed feats of President Kim Il Sung and boundless reverence for General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performances were acclaimed by the audience for their high ideological and artistic value and successful presentation.
					
					 Appreciating them were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, working people in the city of Pyongyang, delegations of overseas compatriots including the delegation of Koreans in Japan, personages, representatives of foreign embassies and international organizations here and foreign guests.

articles.title: Art Festival Goes On in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Art Festival Goes On in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Famous artistes from many countries are performing at the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival, which is going on in Pyongyang to commemorate President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary.
					 A Bulgarian vocalist belonging to the Sophia Opera Theater sings "Song of General Kim Il Sung", making the audience recollect the life of the President, who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 A Russian soloist sings "Girl on a Galloping Steed" reflecting the Korean people's spirit displayed in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 A Mongolian vocalist of the State Symphony Orchestra who attended the festival five times sings another Korean song "My Unforgettable Way" to be acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Ukrainians perform "Dance of Friendship" to the Korean song "Let's Drink a Toast".

articles.title: Chinese Symphony Orchestra Performs in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Chinese Symphony Orchestra Performs in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Symphony Orchestra of Jilin Province, China is performing at the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival in Pyongyang.
					 The symphony orchestra is known in China as an art troupe performing Korean songs well.
					
					 The orchestra has a conductor who won a special prize of the Ministry of Culture last year, international concours winners and other talented performers.
					
					 The orchestra performs "Rich Harvest Comes to the Chongsan Plain", "We Miss His Bright Smile", the second movement of the symphony "President Kim Il Sung Will Be Always with Us", "Charm" and other Korean songs to win warm applause.
					
					 The performance is crowned with the orchestral music "DPRK-China Friendship Will Be Everlasting".
					
					 Zhang Hao, head of the orchestra, told KCNA that they would carry forward Sino-Korean friendship with music to live up to the expectation of the leaders and peoples of the two countries.
					
					 The orchestra performed in honor of leader Kim Jong Il last year when he was visiting China.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statue of President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statue of President Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was laid before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Thursday on the occasion of his birth anniversary. It came from the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong who is related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Thursday by overseas Koreans on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 They included a delegation of Koreans in Japan, delegations of the General Association of Koreans in China, the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., the Federation of Koreans in Canada and the Federation of Koreans in Australia.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statue and paid tribute to the President.
					
					 That day the chief and staff members of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front laid a floral basket before the statue.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Sun Yanfeng, Chinese military, air and naval attache, who is doyen of the corps, handed it to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of embassies of different countries here visited Mangyongdae Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests visited the President's old home at Mangyongdae where he was born and spent childhood, nurturing the noble will for revolution. They went round with keen interest historic relics while being briefed on the immortal story about the time-honored house.
					
					 Meanwhile, they visited the venue of the 13th Kimilsungia Festival on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests who took part in the consultative meeting of senior officials of the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung visited Mangyongdae.
					 They looked round the historic relics preserved with care at the birthplace there. 
					
					 They had a picture taken before the house.
					
					 At the end of their visit they made an entry in the visitor's book. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the guests visited the E-library, the indoor swimming pool and other places of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 The participants in the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited Mangyongdae today.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Representatives of embassies of different countries and international organizations here visited the venue of the 13th Kimilsungia Festival on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the immortal flowers in full bloom, they looked round potted Kimilsungias with deep emotion.
					
					 At the end of the visit, they made an entry in the visitor's book.
					
					 Also visiting the festival venue were delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations in various countries and regions.

articles.title: Foreign Delegation and Delegate Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Delegation and Delegate Arrive
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- V. Kozak, delegate of the "Sun of Juche" Association of Journalists and Men of Culture for the Study of Kimjongilism, arrived here Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Earlier, a delegation of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun led by Chairman B. Davaadorj came here.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Receives Gifts
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Gifts 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the C. C., the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), Yousef Al Amiri, chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, on a visit to the DPRK. 
					 The gifts were handed over to an official concerned.

articles.title: Gift from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Gift from Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The coordinator handed the gift over to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift from Vietnamese Guest
articles.content:
Gift from Vietnamese Guest
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Le Hong Anh, minister of Public Security of Vietnam, who is  member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was handed over to an official concerned by the minister on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift from Mongolian Organization
articles.content:
Gift from Mongolian Organization
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by Chairman L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gifts from Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Gifts from Foreign Guests
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, and Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, who are on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The director-generals of the IIJI and the ARIJI conveyed the gifts to an official concerned.

articles.title: Gift from Official of International Organization
articles.content:
Gift from Official of International Organization
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, on a visit to the DPRK. 
					 Hon handed it over to an official concerned.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Japanese Organization
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Japanese Organization 
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the Japanese preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The basket was handed over to an official concerned by Sumiko Shimizu, representative of the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women who doubles as chairwoman of the preparatory committee, on a visit to the DPRK today.

articles.title: Gifts to Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Gifts to Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Gifts came to President Kim Il Sung, anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and General Secretary Kim Jong Il from the Switzerland-Korea Committee on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the SwitzerlandÔºçKorea Committee, on a visit to the DPRK handed them over to an official concerned on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gifts from Foreign Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
Gifts from Foreign Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations  
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from foreign delegations of Juche idea study organizations.
					 They included a delegation of the Association for the Study of the DPRK of Moscow State University led by Chairman Pavel Reshakov, a delegation of the Ukrainian Independence Federation led by Chairman Vitali Kulik, a delegation of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal led by Chairman Subash Kaji Shrestha and a delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Vice-Chairman Dmitri Model on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The gifts were handed over to officials concerned by the heads of the delegations.

articles.title: Marathon Gold Medalist
articles.content:
Marathon Gold Medalist
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Ro Un Ok, 24, belonging to the April 25 Sports Team took the first place in the IAAF-24th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon held in Pyongyang on April 10 to commemorate President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary, April 15.
					 She learned marathon at a juvenile sports school in North Phyongan Province and became an up-and-coming marathoner in her teens.
					
					 She won the women's marathon race held in Juche 98(2009) and distinguished herself in other national tournaments.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Revered as Sun
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Revered as Sun
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Reverence for President Kim Il Sung is growing stronger in Korea with the approach of his birth anniversary (April 15), known as the Day of the Sun.
					 At the end of the 1920s, young revolutionaries decided to call him Hanbyol meaning a star, in conformity with the desire of the Korean people.
					
					 In autumn of 1930, they changed his name again as Kim Il Sung meaning the sun. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the great Juche idea and applied it to the revolution and construction, bringing about an epoch-making change in hewing out the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 He pursued benevolent politics based on love and trust to provide genuine freedom and happy life to the people.
					
					 He established a socialist system where the people are the masters of the society and everything serves them. He also achieved close unity of the leader, the party and the masses.
					
					 Indeed, President Kim Il Sung was a great man who devoted his all to the country and the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Korean People's Revolutionary Traits
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Korean People's Revolutionary Traits 
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday carries a bylined article on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Establish the Monolithic Ideological System More Thoroughly throughout the Party and Society."
					 This work, published on April 14, Juche 63(1974), clearly indicates precious guidelines for all party members, service persons and people to glorify their lives as Juche type revolutionaries intensely faithful to President Kim Il Sung's idea and cause. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have worked hard to carry out the President's last instructions, sharing will and destiny with the leader guided by the President's revolutionary idea, the Juche idea, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 They have grown to be fighters devotedly protecting the leader amid the struggle to realize the President's idea and cause.
					
					 It is their unshakable will to hold their President and leader in high esteem and lead a worthwhile life on the road of defending the leader.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the whole party and army and all the people centered on the headquarters of the revolution has grown stronger than ever before through the struggle to materialize the President's idea and accomplish his cause.
					
					 The blood ties of the party, army and people centered on the leader are growing stronger than ever before as intended by the President. This is the real picture of the harmonious whole that can be found in Songun Korea only.
					
					 The revolutionary traits of devotedly implementing the party's line and policies have been established throughout the country in the course of the struggle for carrying out the President's idea and cause.
					
					 The above-said revolutionary traits are being fully displayed in the ongoing advance of great surge for opening the gate to a thriving nation.
					
					 A bright future is in store for Songun Korea thanks to the heroic struggle of the army and people of the DPRK intensely faithful to the President's idea and cause, concludes the article.

articles.title: Dangerous Scenario of US-S. Korea for Preemptive Nuclear Attack Blasted
articles.content:
Dangerous Scenario of US-S. Korea for Preemptive Nuclear Attack Blasted 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- At the meeting of the south Korea-U.S. "extended deterrence policy committee" held in Hawaii late in March the U.S. and south Korean warmongers decided to stage "an exercise for operating the extended nuclear deterrent means" in the latter half of this year under the pretext of "threat of nuclear weapons from north Korea."
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a by-lined commentary carried in this connection: 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers' much ado about "threat of nuclear weapons from north Korea" reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 They are raising a hue and cry over such threat, while leaving their crimes on the shelf. This is nothing but rhetoric to mislead the public opinion at home and abroad and justify and push forward the preparations for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The agreement adopted at the meeting called for staging the above-said exercise from this year and taking counter-actions on the basis of the application of specific operation means after conducting twice or thrice drills of the same form. 
					
					 This means that they are set to go over to an actual war while staging "operation exercises" with all latest type military hardware including nuclear weapons involved under the pretext of "threat of nuclear weapons from north Korea" unlike the past when they staged war exercises for aggression against the DPRK under the signboard of "defense."
					
					 They intend to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK under the above-said pretext, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces were in such poor shape as to visit the U.S. for a confab on preemptive nuclear attack, bringing into bolder relief their true colors as traitors making desperate efforts to bring a nuclear disaster to the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is deteriorating day by day due to the warmongers responding to the sincere efforts of the DPRK to improve the north-south relations with the above-said confab in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers will meet only self-destruction, should they put the above-said scenario into practice.

articles.title: Grievances against Traitorous "Government" Mount in S. Korea
articles.content:
Grievances against Traitorous "Government" Mount in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The people's grievances against the present authorities in south Korea are mounting as the days go by, the south Korean newspaper "Hankuk Daily" on April 11 said, and went on:
					 According to the results of a recent opinion poll, the majority of respondents said the present chief executive has not properly administered state affairs.
					
					 They held that the "government" should pursue its economic policy with main emphasis on stabilizing prices, providing job opportunities and narrowing down the gap between the rich and the poor.
					
					 They clarified their will not to support the incumbent lawmakers in their regions when they run for the forthcoming "general elections".

articles.title: Message of Thanks to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon
articles.content:
Message of Thanks to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon 
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of thanks from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Tuesday as regards the recent remittance of educational aid fund and stipends to it.
					The message expressed thanks to him for remitting 165,200,000 yen (in Japanese currency) of educational aid fund and stipends to the Chongryon officials and Korean residents in Japan to develop the democratic national education of Chongryon.
					
					The aid fund and stipends sent so far by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il since April 8, 1957 total to 46,759,450,390 yen on 157 installments, the message noted, saying:
					
					 You are the great teacher and tender-hearted father of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan as you have shown warm care for the happiness of compatriots and the future of their descendants and wisely led them by paving a broad avenue for the fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The message expressed the resolution to cherish the noble intention of Kim Jong Il who wisely led the work for national education, after fixing last year as a year for strengthening this work, and make decisive progress in the drive to protect and develop the national education this year marking the 65th anniversary of the start of the secondary education and the 55th birthday of Joson University.
					
					 The Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan will passionately love and resolutely defend the socialist homeland of Juche and creditably contribute to the nationwide cause of prosperity and reunification of the country, it said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Praised by British Organizations 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on April 8 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The statement said that by electing Kim Jong Il chairman of the NDC of the DPRK it has achieved great successes in all fields of the revolution and construction including the Juche-oriented building of national defence and state.
					
					 The last 18 years were recorded with victories and glory as the DPRK inflicted a shameful defeat upon the U.S. imperialists and their stooges, it said, and continued:
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as a treasured sword for protecting the DPRK from the imperialists' aggression and upholding its independence. 
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the Korean people would register greater successes in their struggle for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics Inaugurated in Nepal
articles.content:
Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics Inaugurated in Nepal
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics of the National Press Club of Nepal was inaugurated in Katmandu on April 3.
					 Ram K. Karmacharya, president of the Club, was elected chairman of the forum.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Observe Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Observe Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers devoted special write-ups to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Peruvian newspaper Accion Nacionalista on April 1 carried several articles with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The articles said: The august name of Kim Il Sung means the sun and he was, indeed, as great as the sun as he was possessed of rays and warmth, its attributes, and human power at the highest level. The banner of independence held aloft by him all his life is always shining along with the DPRK.
					
					 A  Lao newspaper on March 31 carried an article titled "Great Leader of the People" together with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on April 4 carried an article introducing the immortal feats the President performed devoting his all to the people's happiness all his life.
					
					 The Guinean newspaper Horoya on April 1 carried a portrait of the smiling President and devoted its one whole page to an article titled "President Kim Il Sung Is Always Alive in the Hearts of Mankind." 
					
					 The domestic channel of the Guinean broadcasting service on April 2 twice aired a commemorative program titled "Kim Il Sung, Eternal Leader of the Korean People." On the same day the international channel and the seven national languages channel of the broadcasting service aired the same program.

articles.title: Foreign Media Praise Songun Politics
articles.content:
Foreign Media Praise Songun Politics
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries gave special write-ups to the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The Nepali newspaper Arpan on April 1 carried a photo of Kim Jong Il and an article titled "The Supreme Commander and the Invincible Power" which said:
					
					 His election as NDC chairman helped the DPRK dynamically advance along the road of socialism despite the imperialists' intensive moves to stifle it.
					
					 Under the Songun politics the DPRK's politico-ideological position has been cemented in every way and a turning phase was opened for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The Indonesian newspaper Suara Karya on April 2 carried an article titled "The DPRK and Its invincible Military Strength", which dealt with the fact that Kim Jong Il strengthened the Korean People's Army into the matchlessly elite army.
					
					 The Indian newspaper Passion India on March 31 carried an article telling about the fact that Kim Jong Il built up the powerful defence industry to lay a solid material and technological foundation of the self-defensive military power.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al-Ray and Cambodia's Radio FM 90.5 on April 3 and 4 reported that Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman serves as a sure guarantee helping the DPRK fully display its might as an invincible military power.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting, film shows and a photo exhibition took place in France, Bulgaria and South Africa on April 6 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Displayed in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos on the leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Korean people's drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The vice-president of the France-Korea Friendship Association said that the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, is a holiday of not only the Korean people but also progressive humankind.
					
					 Recalling that the President led to victory the two revolutionary wars, the social revolution of two phases and socialist construction of various stages, the vice-president expressed the will to intensify the activities for introducing his greatness and exploits.
					
					 The secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party stressed that there were many leaders and brilliant commanders in the world but Kim Il Sung was the only man who dedicated himself to the people's happiness all his life while living in the open air and undergoing a lot of hardships for their sake. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that the President's cause has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, the secretary noted that the Korean people have worked the world-startling miracles under his leadership.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at a meeting in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Finland and Switzerland posted special write-ups and articles on their Internet homepages on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted the following article with a photo of Kim Il Sung on its Internet homepage on April 5:
					
					 The DPRK significantly commemorates the birth anniversary of eternal leader of the people Kim Il Sung as the Day of the Sun and the most auspicious holiday of the nation.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea in his early years, clearly indicating the road to be followed by the Korean people and progressive humankind. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, has most perfectly embodied the Juche idea and successfully carried forward and developed it.
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically accelerating the building of a thriving socialist nation as required by the Juche idea under his wise leadership.
					
					 The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its Internet homepage on March 28 an article dealing with the fact that the President set forth reasonable proposals and programmes for national reunification and conducted energetic activities till the last moments of his life to put them into practice.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Ethiopia 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea carried the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" in its bulletin No. 21.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), indicates overall ways for achieving the great national unity, including the matters of founding a unified state through the unity of the whole nation, achieving the unity on the basis of patriotism and the spirit of national independence, promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, putting an end to all political disputes that foment division and confrontation between fellow countrymen, ensuring confidence and unity between the north and the south and joining hands on the road of national reunification without rejecting each other because of differing ism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Enhancing the Role of the Popular Masses Is the Guarantee for Victory in the Cause of Independence" was published in pamphlet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries with due ceremony in Moscow on April 7.
					 The work, issued on April 15, Juche 81 (1992), says that the 80 odd year-long life of the President was the life dedicated to the people as a son of the people, the Workers' Party of Korea has firmly maintained the Juche-oriented stand and principle, always regarding the Juche idea as a guiding principle in the whole course of the revolution and construction and the common task before the Korean and other peoples of the world is to build a new independent world.

articles.title: Radioactive Strontium Leaks from Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant of Japan
articles.content:
Radioactive Strontium Leaks from Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant of Japan 
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Another dangerous radioactive substance leaked from the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. 
					 The Japanese government announced that radioactive strontium was detected for the first time on the soil and plants in Fukushima Prefecture more than 30 kilometers away from the crippled power plant. 
					
					 The results of the analysis of soil in three places including Iidate son in Fukushima Prefecture led to the detection of strontium-89 of 260 Bq at maximum per kg of soil. 
					
					 It is known that strontium is more fatal to human bodies than cesium and iodine which have been detected so far. 
					
					 Some of the spent nuclear fuel rods stored in the pools of No. 4 reactor building of the power plant were confirmed to be damaged and the radioactive materials were also confirmed to be in the process of dissolution in the water in the pools after their leakage from there. 
					
					 Experts said the temperature in the above-said pools rose as high as 90 degrees centigrade at one time on Wednesday, expressing concern over the fact that amounts of radioactive materials in the reactor might increase even 100,000 times the normal level to cause additional explosions. 
					
					 Meanwhile, damage by radiation is on the steady increase. 
					
					 The Japanese Tokyo Shimbun on April 11 reported that radioactive cesium more than 26 times the legal level was detected in Lentinus edodes cultivated in Fukushima Prefecture. 
					
					 KBS of south Korea reported that minute traces of radioactive materials were detected on spinach and lettuce in Thongyong and Namhae of South Kyongsang Province and on Jeju Island.
					
					The National Police Agency of Japan said the death toll increased to 13,392 as of 19:00 on Wednesday.
					
					 Aftershocks are going on. 
					
					 Earthquake of Magnitude 5.8 rocked the coastal area of Fukushima Prefecture on Wednesday. Its epicenter was 10 km deep in the waters off the prefecture.

articles.title: Report on US Human Rights Record in 2010 Issued in China
articles.content:
Report on US Human Rights Record in 2010 Issued in China
 Beijing, April 12 (KCNA) -- China's Information Office of the State Council on April 10 published a document titled "U.S. human rights record in 2010" in connection with the "country reports on human rights practices for 2010" issued by the U.S. Department of State.
					 "The country reports are full of distortions and accusations of the human rights situation in other countries and regions including China. However, the U.S. turned a blind eye to its own terrible human rights situation and seldom mentioned it," said the document, stressing that the U.S. has no qualification to style itself a human rights "champion" due to its poor human rights record.

articles.title: Iranian President Warns of US Plot
articles.content:
Iranian President Warns of US Plot 
 Tehran, April 12 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad vehemently decried the U.S. plot, when speaking at a recent meeting.
					 Accusing the U.S. and its allies of attempt to establish two governments in Palestine, he said that this is aimed at saving the Zionist regime from collapse and inflicting harm on the resistant front.
					
					 The era of colonialism and looting has reached an end, he said, adding that the Iranian people are standing shoulder to shoulder with regional nations against bullying powers and will disappoint them in their desire to "swallow" the region.

articles.title: Algeria Slams US "Human Rights Report"
articles.content:
Algeria Slams US "Human Rights Report"
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The head of the Algerian National Consultative Commission for the Promotion and Protection of Human Rights on April 10 slammed the U.S. report on Algerian human rights situation.
					 The report's allegations are based on analysis rather than facts, he said, adding that it is motivated by political factors.
					
					 The report is "flagrant and strange", he said.

articles.title: Venezuela Demands US Extradition of Terrorist
articles.content:
Venezuela Demands US Extradition of Terrorist
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan Foreign Ministry in a statement on April 8 demanded the U.S. extradition of fugitive terrorist Posada Carriles.
					 This terrorist was acquitted on immigration fraud charged by a court in Texas in a trial that day. Describing the trial as a farce, the statement said that the Venezuelan government rejects this.
					
					 The Venezuelan government reiterated its request for him to be extradited to Venezuela for the killing of many people aboard a Cuban airliner bombed in mid-flight in 1976, it said, charging that the U.S. administration uses double standards in its international war on terror.

articles.title: Metro Blast Occurs in Belarus
articles.content:
Metro Blast Occurs in Belarus
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A blast occurred in Minsk subway of Belarus on April 11.
					 The blast, which occurred the moment the two trains arrived at subway station, left 11 persons dead and 126 wounded.
					
					 President of Belarus Aleksandr Lukashenko called an emergency consultative meeting in this regard.
					
					 An investigation into the case is being made.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se re√∫ne con Le Hong Anh
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se re√∫ne con Le Hong Anh
						
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Rep√∫blica Popular Democr√°tica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departi√≥ este jueves en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegaci√≥n de seguridad p√∫blica de Vietnam presidida por su ministro Le Hong Anh, miembro del Bur√≥ Pol√≠tico del Comit√© Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam.
					En la ocasi√≥n, el jefe de la delegaci√≥n se√±al√≥ que el partido y el gobierno de Vietnam aprecian mucho las relaciones de amistad entre los dos pa√≠ses.
					
					Dese√≥ que se desarrollen las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre Vietnam y Corea y manifest√≥ su voluntad de contribuir a la intensificaci√≥n del intercambio y la cooperaci√≥n entre ambas instituciones de seguridad p√∫blica.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena el intento de ataque nuclear EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena el intento de ataque nuclear EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- Durante la reuni√≥n del "comit√© sobre la pol√≠tica de la no proliferaci√≥n" sostenida a finales de marzo en Hawai, los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos acordaron librar en el segundo semestre de este a√±o el llamado "ejercicio de uso de los medios disuasivos de proliferaci√≥n nuclear" pretextando la "amenaza de armas nucleares" de la RPDC con su l√≥gica de bandido.
					Ese pretexto es para justificar y acelerar los preparativos de ataque preventivo nuclear anti-RPDC enga√±ando la opini√≥n p√∫blica interna y externa.
					
					As√≠ se√±ala el peri√≥dico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y contin√∫a:
					
					En el acuerdo firmado en la reuni√≥n referida, ellos coincidieron en librar 2 o 3 veces a partir de este a√±o el "ejercicio de uso de los medios disuasivos de proliferaci√≥n nuclear" y en "preparar las contramedidas usando los medios concretos".
					
					Esto demuestra que los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos intentan desde ahora convertir en la guerra real el "ejercicio" referido, en que tomar√°n parte las armas nucleares y otros equipos b√©licos sofisticados bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza de armas nucleares" de la RPDC.

articles.title: Pyongyang en el clima de veneraci√≥n a Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Pyongyang en el clima de veneraci√≥n a Kim Il Sung
						
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- En v√≠speras del D√≠a del Sol, toda la ciudad de Pyongyang est√° invadida de infinita veneraci√≥n y a√±oranza al Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Muchos militares, civiles, j√≥venes y escolares visitan sin parar a Mangyongdae, tierra natal del Presidente.

					El D√≠a del Sol es la eterna fiesta de primavera para el pueblo coreano y la humanidad progresista del mundo.
